title: Wolverine, Punisher & Ghost Rider: Official Index to the Marvel Universe Marvel Universe (2011) #1
description: The chronicle of the Marvel Universe returns, delving into the history of three more of the House of Ideas' most enduring titles! Return with us to the far-out '70s and the gritty '80s as we launch our coverage of Wolverine (from 1982's WOLVERINE #1), the Punisher (from 1986's PUNISHER #1) and Ghost Rider (from 1972's MARVEL SPOTLIGHT #5). Watch the Marvel Universe's history unfold month by month as each issue provides synopses for dozens of individual comics, including backup strips — introducing the characters, teams, places and equipment that appeared within; and providing vital information about first appearances, where they last showed up and where they appeared next!
